description: York City fail to make up ground on National League leaders as they are held to a draw by Forest Green Rovers.
title: York City 1-1 Forest Green Rovers
title_page: York City 1-1 Forest Green Rovers - Minstermen lose ground on leaders - BBC Sport
maintext:
York's hopes of catching runaway National league leaders Barnet continued to fade after a draw at home to third-placed Forest Green.
The Minstermen failed to return to winning ways at the LNER Community Stadium after a midweek defeat to Altrincham, leaving the Bees 11 points clear having played one game more.
Lewis Richardson fired York ahead in the 49th minute, latching onto a through ball and lifting over goalkeeper Fabian Mrozek for his first goal for the club.
But the lead lasted only four minutes as Harry Cardwell headed in Jordon Garrick's cross.
